scripts.build-uv: yarn build && cd ./packages/universalviewer && yarn exec grunt
scripts.init-uv: cd ./packages/universalviewer && npm install && cd ../../ && yarn exec lerna link --force-local
scripts.quick-uv: cd ./packages/universalviewer && yarn exec grunt sync:npmComponents ts:dev exec:devbuild copy:build copy:dist && notify -t 'done'
scripts.watch-uv: cd ./packages/universalviewer && watchman-make -p 'src/**/*.ts' --make='yarn exec grunt sync:npmComponents ts:dev exec:devbuild copy:build' -t 'copy:dist'
scripts.start: run-p watch-uv watch-uv-extern uv-examples av-comp av-watch
